productShortDesc: This niacinamide serum helps prevent blemishes and soothes post-breakout redness while smoothing and refining texture. 87% naturally derived. Vegan. Made in France.
productIngredients:
Niacinamide (12%):
There are two forms of vitamin B3 â€“ niacin and niacinamide. Niacinamide strengthens the skin's barrier and accelerates the healing process. It also promotes microcirculation of the skin. Thanks to its potent anti-inflammatory properties, niacinamide makes the ideal treatment for sensitive skin types looking to improve their overall complexion and promote healthier skin.
